columns.address_id: The unique identifier for each address entry.
columns.line_1: The primary address line containing essential location details.
columns.line_2: The secondary address line for additional location information.
columns.city: The city associated with the address.
columns.zip_postcode: The postal code for the address area.
columns.state_province_county: The state, province, or county of the address.
columns.country: The country where the address is located.

Addresses.table_description: The table stores detailed address information for students.

columns.person_id: The unique identifier for each person entry.
columns.first_name: The first name of the person.
columns.middle_name: The middle name of the person.
columns.last_name: The last name of the person.
columns.cell_mobile_number: The mobile phone number of the person.
columns.email_address: The email address for contacting the person.
columns.login_name: The username used for system login.
columns.password: The password for securing the person's account.

People.table_description: The table stores personal information for students and candidates.

columns.student_id: The unique identifier for each student.

Students.table_description: The table stores information about students enrolled in the program.

columns.course_id: The unique identifier for each course.
columns.course_name: The name of the course offered.
columns.course_description: The detailed overview of the course content.
columns.other_details: Any additional information related to the course.

Courses.table_description: The table stores information about courses available for students.

columns.student_id: The unique identifier for each student in the registration.
columns.course_id: The unique identifier for each course registered by the student.
columns.registration_date: The timestamp indicating when the student registered for the course.

Student_Course_Registrations.table_description: The table tracks student registrations for various courses.

columns.student_id: The unique identifier for each student attending classes.
columns.course_id: The unique identifier for each course being attended.
columns.date_of_attendance: The date and time when the student attended the course.

Student_Course_Attendance.table_description: The table records attendance of students in their respective courses.

columns.candidate_id: The unique identifier for each candidate in the system.
columns.candidate_details: The name or details identifying the candidate.

Candidates.table_description: The table stores information about candidates participating in assessments.

columns.person_address_id: The unique identifier for each person-address relationship.
columns.person_id: The unique identifier for each person associated with the address.
columns.address_id: The unique identifier for each address linked to the person.
columns.date_from: The starting date when the address was associated with the person.
columns.date_to: The ending date when the address was no longer used by the person.

People_Addresses.table_description: The table manages the address history for each person in the system.

columns.candidate_id: The unique identifier for each candidate's assessment record.
columns.qualification: The qualification code associated with the candidate's assessment.
columns.assessment_date: The date when the assessment was conducted.
columns.asessment_outcome_code: The outcome of the assessment, indicating pass or fail status.

Candidate_Assessments.table_description: The table records assessment results for candidates and their qualifications.
